DOC.brief_summary: To assess the pharmacokinetics of AZD1656, and its metabolite, in type 2 diabetes mellitus patients with varying degrees of renal impairment and to compare the results with those in patients with normal renal function.
DOC.brief_title: To Assess the Pharmacokinetics of AZD1656 and Its Metabolite in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with a clinical diagnosis of T2DM for at least 1 year, treated with any OAD or insulin Calculated MDRD GFR based on Screatinine at enrollment should fall within any of the 4 categories: mild , moderate, severe normal Clinically significant progression of current disease or clinically relevant trauma, as judged by the Investigator, within 2 weeks before the first administration of the IP Clinically significant neuropathy according to the Investigator. However subjects with diabetic neuropathy which is not clinically significant according to the Investigator may be included.
